name: Temple of Pizza
description: Deliver pizzas to a mysterious party taking place in a previously abandoned temple in the woods.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel® i5-4590/AMD FX 8350 equivalent or greater Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 970 / AMD Radeon™ R9 290 equivalent or greater Storage: 250 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel® i5-4590/AMD FX 8350 equivalent or greater Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 970 / AMD Radeon™ R9 290 equivalent or greater Storage: 250 MB available space
